item.title: Pixelgraph
item.description: One of the reasons I wanted to start this blog was to have a place I felt comfortable sharing the various smaller projects I like to bash out over a weekend or two. So, it feels only fitting that the first post I make should be about one of those projects!

item.title: Michael's Poop Horse
item.description: “I have a game idea,” Michael said.

item.title: Sonic X Reebok
item.description: This post is dedicated to the Sonic x Reebok shoes I recieved for my birthday. They're the Knuckles edition shoes and dang, they look so good! I've never put on a pair of shoes and thought "Damn, these are cool", but I'm a changed man now.
